# Pattern Template

> Template for documenting architecture patterns.

## Pattern Name

[Clear, descriptive name for the pattern]

## Context

When and why would you use this pattern? What problem does it solve?

## Problem

Detailed description of the problem this pattern addresses.

## Solution

Description of the solution and how the pattern works.

## Structure

Diagram or description of the pattern structure:
- Components
- Relationships
- Interactions

## Implementation

How to implement this pattern:
- Step-by-step guide
- Code examples
- Configuration examples

## Consequences

### Benefits
- What advantages does this pattern provide?
- When does it work well?

### Drawbacks
- What are the trade-offs?
- When should you avoid this pattern?

## Examples

Real-world examples or code samples.

## Related Patterns

- Links to related patterns
- Alternative patterns
- Patterns that complement this one

## References

- Books, articles, or other resources
- External links
